%!TeX jobNames = bibtex-1, bibtex-2, biber-1, biber-2
%!TeX bibtex-2:outputDirectory = output
%!TeX biber-2:outputDirectory = output
%!TeX check = bibtex -version, biber -version
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{xstring}

\StrBefore*{\jobname}{-}[\backend]

\usepackage[backend=\backend]{biblatex}

\bibliography{foo}{}

\begin{document}
  foo, wibble, wibble \cite{Angle:2003}, gronk.
  \printbibliography
\end{document}
